ygData.subject: Re: quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You want to make sure you are killing the right crocs there - the rune isnt that uncommon a drop (once every hour or so, I would say).  The ONLY crocs that
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
> you didn't solo all of them? :) I'm one rune away from the Runescale
> Cloak, I've been camping crocs in Guk but haven't found one yet.
> -- Lim'Dul

You want to make sure you are killing the right crocs there - the rune
isnt that uncommon a drop (once every hour or so, I would say). The
ONLY crocs that drop it are the SALTwater ones, where the 3 crocs spawn
with the ancient croc spot.

RE: The rods. Actually, it isnt that bad. One of the few times I didnt
mind the overcrowding in lower guk - heck, you dont even need inviso to
undead on our server on a friday night - you can just waltz up to it
scott free!

Micon Bittermage
Karana
